LunarVim /

      Neovim-from-scratch---A Neovim config designed from scratch to be understandable

ethereum /

      EIPs---The Ethereum Improvement Proposal repository

yt-dlp /

      yt-dlp---A youtube-dl fork with additional features and fixes

Shopify /

      react-native-skia---High-performance React Native Graphics using Skia

MarlinFirmware /

      Marlin---Marlin is an optimized firmware for RepRap 3D printers based on the Arduino platform. | Many commercial 3D printers come with Marlin installed. Check with your vendor if you need source code for your specific machine.

github /

      docs---The open-source repo for docs.github.com

Revadike /

      epicgames-freebies-claimer---Claim available free game promotions from the Epic Games Store.

nolanlawson /

      fuite---A tool for finding memory leaks in web apps

danielyxie /

      bitburner---Bitburner Game

xinntao /

      Real-ESRGAN---Real-ESRGAN aims at developing Practical Algorithms for General Image Restoration.

EbookFoundation /

      free-programming-books---📚 Freely available programming books

bottlesdevs /

      Bottles---Easily manage wine prefixes in a new way. Run Windows software and games on Linux

qier222 /

      YesPlayMusic---高颜值的第三方网易云播放器，支持 Windows / macOS / Linux

ossu /

      data-science---📊 Path to a free self-taught education in Data Science!

CollabCodeTech /

      backend-challenges---A public list of open-source challenges from jobs around the world

signalapp /

      Signal-Android---A private messenger for Android.

wez /

      wezterm---A GPU-accelerated cross-platform terminal emulator and multiplexer written by @wez and implemented in Rust

Stephan-S /

      FS22_AutoDrive---FS22 version of the AutoDrive mod

laurent22 /

      joplin---Joplin - an open source note taking and to-do application with synchronization capabilities for Windows, macOS, Linux, Android and iOS. Forum: https://discourse.joplinapp.org/

521xueweihan /

      HelloGitHub---分享 GitHub 上有趣、入门级的开源项目。Share interesting, entry-level open source projects on GitHub.

alacritty /

      alacritty---A cross-platform, OpenGL terminal emulator.

ErikCH /

      DevYouTubeList---List of Development YouTube Channels

godotengine /

      godot---Godot Engine – Multi-platform 2D and 3D game engine

LianjiaTech /

      bruno---Bruno 是基于一整套设计体系的 Flutter 组件库。An enterprise-class package of Flutter components for mobile applications.

freqtrade /

      freqtrade---Free, open source crypto trading bot
